summary: A Hi-Res texture for the Iron Shield
descriptionHtml:
A quick higher resolution texture for the Iron Shield. Only the Diffuse map atm but still an improvement over the original, particularly in 1stPerson, despite the small vanilla normal/spec maps. 

I may create hi-res spec/normal maps in the not too distant future.

Installation:
Put the Data folder in your Skyrim folder

eg. ProgramFiles/Steam/Steamapps/Common/Skyrim

It will merge with your Data folder but won\'t overwrite any files (unless you already have a Iron Shield texture mod)
author: Bandu
